tika.keywords: Paul;apostle;textbook;pauline studies;pauline letters;Romans;Ephesians;Corinthians;Damascus Road;conversion;apostle Paul;pseudonymity;pauls letters;pauls conversion;biblical studies;biblical studies textbook;paul textbook
tika.dc.description: For some of us, the apostle Paul is intimidating, prickly, and unpredictable. But maybe it's time to get to know Paul on his own terms. Drawing on the best of contemporary scholarship, and with language shaped by conversations with today's students, this second edition of Rediscovering Paul gives fresh consideration to Paul’s conversion, call, and his ongoing impact on church and culture.
